data.title: Offenbach power station
data.meta_description: Offenbach power station is an operating power station of at least 60-megawatts (MW) in Offenbach am Main, Hessen, Germany.

a Global Energy Monitor project. Related coal trackers:

Offenbach power station is an operating power station of at least 60-megawatts (MW) in Offenbach am Main, Hessen, Germany.

Location

Table 1: Project-level location details

Plant name Location Coordinates (WGS 84) Offenbach power station Offenbach am Main, Hessen, Germany 50.111293, 8.745393 (exact)

Background

Offenbach power station was commissioned in 1990 by Energieversorgung Offenbach AG.[2]
